verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, and the garments <S%H899><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, and a basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>;
And gather <S%H6950><s%> thou all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and the assembly <S%H5712><s%> was gathered together <S%H6950><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be done <S%H6213><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and washed <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And he put <S%H5414><s%> upon him the coat <S%H3801><s%>, and girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the girdle <S%H73><s%>, and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with the robe <S%H4598><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> upon him, and he girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and bound <S%H640><s%> it unto him therewith.
And he put <S%H7760><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> upon him: also he put <S%H5414><s%> in the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim <S%H8550><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the mitre <S%H4701><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; also upon the mitre <S%H4701><s%>, even upon his forefront <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4136><s%>, did he put <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> plate <S%H6731><s%>, the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%>; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all that was therein, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> them.

And he sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> thereof upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, both the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.
And he poured <S%H3332><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon Aaron's <S%H175><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> him, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> coats <S%H3801><s%> upon them, and girded <S%H2296><s%> them with girdles <S%H73><s%>, and put <S%H2280><s%> bonnets <S%H4021><s%> upon them; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>. put bonnets: Heb. bound bonnets

And he brought <S%H5066><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and purified <S%H2398><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, to make reconciliation <S%H3722><s%> upon it.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and their fat <S%H2459><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

But the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and his hide <S%H5785><s%>, his flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and his dung <S%H6569><s%>, he burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> for the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.
And he killed <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And he cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into pieces <S%H5409><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>, and the pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and the fat <S%H6309><s%>.

And he washed <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it was a burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>, and an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> it; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron's <S%H175><s%> right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%>, and upon the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>.

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%>, and upon the thumbs <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toes <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the rump <S%H451><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and their fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%>:

And out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, that was before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%>, and a cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread, and one <S%H259><s%> wafer <S%H7550><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> them on the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and upon the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%>:

And he put <S%H5414><s%> all upon Aaron's <S%H175><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%>, and upon his sons' <S%H1121><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%>, and waved <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them from off their hands <S%H3709><s%>, and burnt <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>: they were consecrations <S%H4394><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%>, and waved <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for of the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%> it was Moses' <S%H4872><s%> part <S%H4490><s%>; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and of the blood <S%H1818><s%> which was upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon his garments <S%H899><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> with him; and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and his garments <S%H899><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> with him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Boil <S%H1310><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and there eat <S%H398><s%> it with the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%> of consecrations <S%H4394><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.
And that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and of the bread <S%H3899><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And ye shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> in seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until the days <S%H3117><s%> of your consecration <S%H4394><s%> be at an end <S%H4390><s%>: for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall he consecrate <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> you.
As he hath done <S%H6213><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you.

Therefore shall ye abide <S%H3427><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that ye die <S%H4191><s%> not: for so I am commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
So Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all things <S%H1697><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
